thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: C wilkes
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by C wilkes

author: C wilkes
title: C wilkes
text: I've used this company several times now and they have excellent service. Recently I invited friends for a surprise dinner of seafood...but they did not know the dinner was being flown in from Maine and decided to go out of town. I had to change the delivery date twice to accommodate these guests and Michael was most obliging. I feel these folks really care about customers being happy. Thank you?
